description: A vulnerability, which was classified as critical, has been found in zj1983 zz up to 2024-8. Affected by this issue is the function sendNotice of the file src/main/java/com/futvan/z/erp/customer_notice/Customer_noticeAction.java of the component HTTP Request Handler. The manipulation of the argument url leads to server-side request forgery. The attack may be launched remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way.
